HOME_PAGE.MAIN_DESCRIPTION: At MerMer, we merge AI and blockchain with strategic resources and policy know-how to help businesses level up. From tech upgrades to securing grants and funding, we’ve got it covered. We don't just get the tech — we make it pay off.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_SUBTITLE: Driving Business Momentum with Smart Innovation
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_1_1: Apply for SBIR, MOST, MOEA, and Local Revitalization grants
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_1_2: Tailor-made proposal writing, review simulations, and pitch coaching
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_1_3: Presentation support or representation by expert consultants
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_1_4: Ongoing audits to track project performance
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_2_1: Develop business plans, investment models, and pitch decks
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_2_2: Create brand videos, press releases, and social media content
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_2_3: Presentation support or coaching for investor pitches
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_2_4: Continuous audits for valuation and market positioning
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_3_4: ESG and AI policy compliance guidance
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_4_1: AI development: vision, NLP, generative AI
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_4_2: Blockchain: smart contracts, tokenomics, DeFi systems
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_4_4: Connect with academia for collaborative innovation
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_SUBTITLE: Because we’re not just consultants — we’re your strategic partners on the journey of innovation.
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_1_DESCRIPTION: We have deep roots in AI and blockchain, combining over a decade of hands-on experience and theoretical knowledge in technology, policy resources, and capital markets.
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_2_DESCRIPTION: From ideation, proposal writing, pitching, review, execution, and closing — to branding and fundraising presentations — we provide end-to-end integrated services, allowing startups and businesses to focus on their products and core operations.
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_3_DESCRIPTION: We excel at translating complex technical jargon into language that investors and government officials understand. From strategic frameworks and visual design to verbal delivery, our team strengthens your persuasive power.
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_4_TITLE: Exclusive Industry Intelligence & Think Tank Support
HOME_PAGE.WHY_CHOOSE_MERMER_4_DESCRIPTION: We collaborate with VCs, legal entities, academic institutions, industrial bureaus, and accelerators. Based on your project, we introduce key resources, internal review advice, and potential partners to help you break through industry barriers.

AUTHOR.JULIAN_INTRO: Give me a cup of Milk Cap Tea and I can lift the whole world. Must be full sugar and Cream Cheese flavor. Preferably topped with a Strawberry Mochi.
AUTHOR.JODIE_INTRO: Has a weird obsession with fluffy things. During meetings, there are always two little minions by her side cheering her on with gusto. If it comes to a fight, they can do nothing but meow.
AUTHOR.EMILY_INTRO: A weight training enthusiast who can effortlessly deadlift seventy kilograms shifted to road cycling and became a carb-loving chubby person. Now, she plans to restructure her training routine to regain the lost muscle mass.
AUTHOR.SHIRLEY_INTRO: “I'm thinking of buying a new monitor, maybe I'll head to MUJI and take a look,” is her train of thought.
AUTHOR.STEVE_INTRO: Due to his excessive drinking, Steve suffers from serious memory impairment. He has a skill for wine tasting, but he often loses track of who he is. The only thing he is sure of is his aversion to sherry.
AUTHOR.YANG_INTRO: “A Ramos Gin Fizz, a touch of blues, and endless facial anxiety. Love dancing in the dance floor, but too lazy to workout.
AUTHOR.LIZ_INTRO: A dad joke lover and meme collector. A bit socially anxious. Consistently testing as ISTP in the MBTI for several years. Favorite activity is spending the whole day playing video games on the couch with the best friends.
AUTHOR.MURKY_INTRO: To kill the Demon, you need to put a dead witcher into his pocket secretly.
